verification.notes: Canonical name+slug generated. Web search geocoded. Source: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/La_Grange_Mine. The La Grange Mine is a former hydraulic gold mine located in Trinity County, California, and is now a California Historical Landmark

web_search_companies.notes: The mine was operated by a group of French and Colorado investors and was the largest hydraulic mine in California during its operation.
